content: cat colors journey has been amazing - row 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet increase in each stitch slip_stitch to first my goal with every pattern is to make it easily readable half_double_crochet 16 and adjustable to your own personal preferences i hope that by the end of this pattern you have learned the skills - row 3 chain 2 double_crochet double_crochet increase * repeat 8 times slip_stitch to necessary to make your own designs that are custom to first double_crochet 24 you my goal is to inspire and help others make their own beautiful art - row 4 single_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet double_crochet i look forward to seeing your creations please tag me in chain 2 single_crochet in the same stitch 3 single_crochet single_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in the any social media you want with pictures of you in your same stitch double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in the same stitch 3 finished item i really want to see them you can even single_crochet single_crochet increase * repeat 2 times 3 single_crochet chain 20 double_crochet in the 3rd email your images at fleetingobsessions@gmail com and i chain from the hook 5 double_crochet down the chain double_crochet increase * will feature them on my tiktok or other social media repeat 3 times total 12 double_crochet down the chain single_crochet into the pages i am happy to tag you if you are sure to let me next stitch along your round 2 single_crochet single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet single_crochet know who to credit you deserve just as much credit as i do for your finished piece increase * repeat 2 more times slip_stitch to the first stitch 4 chain 2s 29 double_crochet 26 single_crochet stay crafty tie off krista mccloud *you can make your tail longer or shorter fleeting obsessions art depending on your preferences for one of my tails i only made the tail 18 stitches
